description: A BRIGHT AND COLORFUL THANK YOU

These thank you cards and envelopes are perfect for a young child to express gratitude for gifts they receive. Whether it be after a birthday party or thanking their teachers for being awesome, these cards make it easy to write a nice thank you note and express your gratitude!

QUALITY & SPLENDOR: All of our products are made from high quality materials and card stock. We pride ourselves on bringing nothing short of spectacular quality to the marketplace, among all of our current and future products, every single time. You will be delighted with the look, feel and overall attention to detail that we focus on with our products.

Stylish in design, yet clean and crisp.

Includes White Envelopes as durable as the cardstock for easy addressing.
Manufactured with love and passion in the USA.
